text: niyata vaśayenma num̆baṭa pratignā dennan vanāhi ovuhu pratignā denuyē allāhṭaya. allāhgē ata ovungē at valaṭa ihaḷini. eheyin kavareku (pratignāva) kaḍa kaḷē da niyata vaśayenma esē ovun pratignāva kaḍa karanuyē tamanṭa erehivaya. tavada kavara deyak veta taman allāhṭa pratignā dunnē da eya iṭu kaḷa viṭa ohu mahat vū tiḷiṇayak ohuṭa pirinamanu æta
